code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{Container,Row,Col,Card,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import RecipeService from"../../services/recipe.service";import"../style.css";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserRecipePage=()=>{const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const{userId}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{RecipeService.getUserRecipe(userId).then(_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;setRecipes(data);}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});},[userId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"py-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[recipes[0]&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[" ",recipes[0].user_name.toUpperCase()," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{xs:1,md:3,className:"g-4",children:recipes.map((recipe,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Recipe,{recipe:recipe},idx))})]})});};const Recipe=_ref2=>{let{recipe}=_ref2;const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"p-1",variant:"outline-secondary",onClick:()=>navigate("/recipes/".concat(recipe.id)),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:"../../boba.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Title,{as:"h4",children:[" ",recipe.name.toUpperCase()," "]})})]})})});};export default UserRecipePage;
